ContentSnippet.Name: CSS Style
ContentSnippet.ContentSnippet:
<style>
.type ol {
	padding: 0;
}

.type ol > li {
	margin: 0 0 10px 20px;
}

.style-container {
	margin-top: -2px;
}

.text-box {
	background-color: #ffcf06;
	padding: 20px 20px 25px 0;
	margin-bottom: 15px;
	clear: both;
}

.text-box > p,
.text-box > h1,
.text-box > h2,
.text-box > h3,
.text-box > h4,
.text-box > hr
{
	color: #000;
}

.text-box > h1,
.text-box > h2,
.text-box > h3,
.text-box > h4
{
	text-transform: uppercase;
	letter-spacing: 3pt;
	margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.text-box > p {
	font-size: 1.2em;
	margin-bottom: 0;
	padding-left: 20px;
}

.subtitle-container {
	margin: 20px 0 12px 0;
	bbackground-image: url("images/university-relations/education-week/side-arrow-blue.png");\
	background: url("images/university-relations/education-week/side-arrow-blue.png") no-repeat right center;
}

.more-info p,
.show-more
{
	margin-top: -20px;
}

.separator {
	background: #000;
	color: #000;
	margin: 15px 0 15px 0;
}

.type h1 {
	padding: 7px 20px;
	background-color: #000;
	letter-spacing: 4pt;
	font-family: "Century Gothic", "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
	font-size: 1.8em;
	line-height: 1.2em;
}

.type h1,
.type h2
{
	color: #fff;
	margin: 0;
	text-transform: uppercase;
	display: inline-block;
	font-weight: bold;
	font-style: normal;
}

.type h2 {
	padding: 7px 17px;
	background-color: #0f6cb6;
	letter-spacing: 2pt;
	font-family: "Century Gothic", "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, serif;
	font-size: 1.3em;
	line-height: 1.1em;
}

.type h3 {
	padding-bottom: 0;
	font-weight: bold;
	font-size: 1.1em;
}

.main-title-container > h1 {
	color: #fff !important;
}

.make-link {
	position: absolute; 
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	top: 0;
	left: 0;
	z-index: 1;
	background-image: url("empty.png");
}

#text-container {
	width: 550px;
}

.type blockquote {
	border: 0;
	color: #303538;
	margin-bottom: 0;
	margin-top: 0;
}

.type .section-heading {
	margin: -15px 0 15px;
	display: block;
	clear: both;
}

/* TABLES STYLE */
.type table {
	width: 410px;
	margin: 0 0 25px 0;
}

.type table th {
	color: #000;
	background-color: #ffcf06;
	font-size: 0.7em;
	letter-spacing: 1.5pt;
	text-transform: uppercase;
	padding-left: 20px;
}

.type table,
.type table caption,
.hotel-copy
{
	-webkit-box-shadow: 2px 2px 3px #888;
	-moz-box-shadow: 2px 2px 3px #888;
	box-shadow: 2px 2px 3px #888;
}

.type table tbody tr:nth-child(even) td,
.type table tbody tr:nth-child(even):hover td
{
	background-color: #f1f1f1;
}

.type table tbody tr:nth-child(odd):hover td {
	background-color: #fff;
}

.type table td {
	color: #000;
	padding-left: 20px;
}

.copy { width: 60%; }

caption {
	background-color: #fff;
	caption-side: bottom;
	font-size: 0.7em;
}
</style>
